page.title: 12S.Y.D. WORKING-MENS CLUB
page.content: The S.Y.D.(Scottish,Yorkshire and Durham)Club is situated next to our school on Hazel Road.Apart from the usual working-mens club attractions of bar,bingo,snooker,pool,darts,dominoes and entertainment there are many other clubs based there. The{S.Y.D. Boxing club}train on Wednesdays and Saturdays and have produced an{English Schoolboys {Champion.}Children can start training when they are 5 years old but can only box in the ring when they are 12. {Five S.Y.D. football teams play in the {Charles Rice League,}from the Under 11's to the Under 15's,and this year they are starting an Over 17 team. Training is on Tuesdays and Saturdays with games on Saturdays and Sundays. There are Discos on Tuesdays and Thursdays for children aged 11 and over.The S.Y.D.Club is a busy place.
